title: Make ekko's w like a thresh lantern. but offensive, and he can only jump to it with his e. then put
body: put dmg on it. so he phase dives to his w and infuses it with dmg while tirggering the stun. so aoe phase dive, applies onhit effects in an aoe. but considers them single target. lichbane spell vamp broken..

replies.body: if it does not nerf. then NO. if it does nerf then YES
if they did that they'd hve to increase his numbers or add power elsewhere in his kit/ he's fine as is.
